Constructor Detail

NewTreeParameterModel

public NewTreeParameterModel(TreeModel tree,
                             Parameter parameter,
                             boolean includeRoot,
                             boolean includeTips)
This class constructs a tree parameter, and will set the dimension of the parameter to match the appropriate number of nodes if necessary.

Parameters:
tree - the tree that this parameter corresponds to
parameter - the parameter to keep in sync with tree topology moves.
includeRoot - tree if the parameter includes a value associated with the root node.
includeTips -

getTrait

public java.lang.Double getTrait(Tree tree,
                                 NodeRef node)
Description copied from interface: TreeTrait
Returns the trait values for the given node. If this is a branch trait then it will be for the branch above the specified node (and may not be valid for the root). The array will be the length returned by getDimension().

Specified by:
getTrait in interface TreeTrait<java.lang.Double>
Specified by:
getTrait in class AbstractTreeParameterModel<java.lang.Double>
Parameters:
tree - a reference to a tree
node - a reference to a node
Returns:
the trait value
